#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Altitude.

== Name ==

*[CAltitude Altitude]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Altitude (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Altitude of a point. Use mode attribute to determine semantics.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *mode = [SAltitudeModeEnum AltitudeModeEnum]*
          >[Sdouble double]</...>

----
          

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| mode ||   || [SAltitudeModeEnum golfml:AltitudeModeEnum] || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPositionGPS PositionGPS]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Altitude">  <xs:simpleContent>    <xs:extension base="xs:double">      <xs:attribute name="mode" type="golfml:AltitudeModeEnum" use="required"/>    </xs:extension>  </xs:simpleContent></xs:complexType>
----
